title: Microprogrammed Control
subject: Computer Organization
theory:
Implemented using Software (Microcode) in ROM. 
Opcode -> Address in Control Memory -> Fetch Microinstruction -> Generate Signals. 
**Pros**: Flexible (Update ROM to fix bugs). 
**Cons**: Slower. Used in CISC.

interview_questions.question: Hardwired vs Microprogrammed?
interview_questions.answer: Hardwired = Gates = Faster = RISC. Microprogrammed = ROM = Flexible = CISC.
